import React, { Component } from "react"; import Speech from 'react-speech'; var FinalJeopardy = (props) => { // console.log(props.activeCategor // let categories =props.categories console.log(props.myscore) return (
{props.myscore > 0 ?
{props.myscore}

Welcome to Final Jeopardy

{props.ready ?

{props.question.questions[0].question}

{props.placeWager(e)}} > props.handleWager(e)} className = "final-answer" type = "text" name = "final-answer">
:

The category is {props.question.name}

Place your wager

{props.placeWager(e)}} > props.handleWager(e)} className = "wager" type = "number" name = "wager">
}
:

Sorry, you need money to participate in Final Jeopardy

}
) } export default FinalJeopardy;
